attributes.action: Make the use of ID Cards voluntary and not mandatory indefinitely  if introduced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the debacle of the 25 million persons details being lost by HMRC and that obviously the government is incapable of securing personal data, ensure that any legislation introduced for ID cards is on a purely voluntary basis.

No fines, criminal or civil prosecutions are to be allowed if a person refuses a request for data to be incorporated into any form of ID regardless of whether it is home grown, EU based or international.
